title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Dana Carvey's great Biden impression makes Stephen Colbert uncomfortable because he's just a hack Democrat operative, not a comedian. Biden reads verbatim from handlers notes at press conference. Putin schools U.S. media. Makes you want to be rootin' for Putin. Biden on Putin. RichardGrenell on Biden and Putin. Trump says Biden got nothing from Putin for the Nord Stream pipeline. Biden lectures Kaitlan Collins of CNN. Rush on how Putin views the U.S. Border chaos continues, Kamala still won't go there. Texas Governor Abbott, Congressman Kevin Brady on Biden's open-borders policy. Rush on immigration crisis: We can't take in everyone in the world, we need to spread our way of life to other countries. Free-state governors like DeSantis sending reinforcements to Texas border.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Charles Barkley announces that he's leaving TNT's basketball show in a year, calls his woke bosses cowards. Rush on Barkley's political incorrectness. Censorship on social media. Rebellion against woke education, critical race theory all across America. African-American activist and radio show host Ty Smith blasts CRT. New covid scare on variants. Face masks found to contain all kinds of bacteria. Fauci wrote a paper on the ineffectiveness of masks. Rush on coronavirus and the flu. Caller on Governor Abbott's wall press conference. Newark building statue of George Floyd. Ken reads from the Declaration of Independence. SCOTUS dismisses challenge to Obamacare.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Chicago Mayor Lightfoot rips staff in bonkers memo demanding more "office time" every day. Rush on "Mayor Lightweight." Who are Biden's handlers? SCOTUS rejects challenge to Obamacare. Rush on how the Obamacare architects designed it to fail. EIB High Note: Great-Great-Great-Grandmother. Texas caller on liberal takeover of Houston. Next big Constitutional battle is over the 2nd Amendment. Poll finds 58% of Americans have an unfavorable view of CRT.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
